mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Caskaden, James to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Caskaden, James
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 4 1863. By Telegraph from New Creek 4 1863. Has Parkersburg Convention been postponed Jas Caskaden 6Bv40pd [page 2] Better not let the Battery go to Ohio from the within information then F. H. Peirpoint
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Caskaden, James
New Creek, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
